Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We report a 57 - year - old woman with end - stage renal disease receiving continuous ambulatory peritoneal dialysis ( CAPD ) , who developed slurred speech , tremor , bizarre behavior , progressive mental confusion , and 2 episodes of generalized tonic - clonic seizure ( GTCS ) after 5 doses of piperacillin / tazobactam ( 2 g / 250 mg ) were given for bronchiectasis with secondary infection .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| end-stage renal disease |
| bronchiectasis with secondary infection |
| generalized tonic-clonic seizure (GTCS) |

The disease entities mentioned in the paragraph are "end-stage renal disease," "bronchiectasis with secondary infection," and "generalized tonic-clonic seizure (GTCS)".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

The only entities that clearly refer to "Disease" in the paragraph are "end-stage renal disease," "bronchiectasis with secondary infection," and "generalized tonic-clonic seizure (GTCS)". The other entities mentioned, such as "slurred speech," "tremor," "bizarre behavior," and "progressive mental confusion" are symptoms or manifestations of a disease, not diseases themselves.
